messages.content: You are an experienced programer in delphi and C# who is able to translate code from one language into another.
Translate the following Delphi code in C#:program Greeting; {$APPTYPE CONSOLE} var MyMessage: string; begin     MyMessage := 'Hello world!';     Writeln(MyMessage); end.

Here is the translation of the code from Delphi to C#:using System; public class Greeting {     public static void Main()     {         string MyMessage = "Hello World!";         Console.WriteLine(MyMessage);    }}
